snippet: A watchdog says Michigan child welfare workers missed opportunities to remove a 12-year-old boy from his Grand Rapids-area home due to abuse, long before he was accused of fatally stabbing another boy....

headline.print_headline: Michigan Faulted for Not Removing Abused Boy
headline.main: Michigan Faulted for Not Removing Abused Boy

lead_paragraph: A watchdog says Michigan child welfare workers missed opportunities to remove a 12-year-old boy from his Grand Rapids-area home due to abuse, long before he was accused of fatally stabbing another boy.
